text: Massimo Marino (born 4 June 1954) is an Italian former cyclist. He competed at the 1972 and 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Italy Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists from Rome
title: Massimo Marino
